item.title: 日本股市因加息担忧而下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在执政党选举引发对央行进一步加息的预期后，日本股市周一早盘将大幅下挫。交易商还将密切关注中东地区的事态发展。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to slump early Monday after ruling party elections raised expectations of further central bank interest rate hikes. Traders will also be closely watching events in the Middle East.】

item.title: 石破获胜后日本股市将因加息担忧而下跌
item.description: 石破茂在执政党领导层竞选中出人意料地获胜，引发了人们对加息的预期，日本股市很可能会因此而下跌。【原文：Japanese stocks will likely tumble after Shigeru Ishiba’s surprise victory in the ruling party’s leadership race raised expectations that interest rates will increase.】

item.title: 里德-哈斯廷斯向卡马拉-哈里斯捐款后，Netflix 取消订单激增
item.description:
在特朗普的支持者呼吁对流媒体服务采取行动后，取消服务的比例几乎增加了两倍。【原文：

Rate of cancellations almost tripled after Trump backers called for action against the streaming service.

】

item.title: 真主党领导人之死引发紧张局势，石油走高
item.description: 真主党领导人哈桑-纳斯鲁拉（Hassan Nasrallah）的遇害加剧了中东地区的紧张局势，交易商们正等待着看伊朗将如何回应，石油价格随之走高。【原文：Oil edged higher after the killing of Hezbollah’s leader, Hassan Nasrallah, stoked tensions in the Middle East, with traders waiting to see how Iran would respond.】

item.title: 中国人黄金周前往欧洲和遥远的热点地区
item.description: 黄金周假期期间，中国有数亿人外出旅游，更多中国人前往欧洲和其他遥远的热点地区，这是中国重新开放边境以来最强劲的旅游反弹迹象。【原文：More Chinese are headed to Europe and other far-flung hotspots during the Golden Week holiday that sees hundreds of millions in the country on the move, in the most robust signs of a travel rebound since the country re-opened its borders.】

item.title: 反对丰田董事长的声音在大股东中蔓延
item.description: 反对丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男的一系列汽车安全丑闻引发了人们对他的领导能力和这家全球最大汽车制造商未来的担忧，在这家日本公司的一些最大投资者中出现了反对他的声音。【原文：Opposition to Toyota Motor Corp. Chairman Akio Toyoda has surfaced among some of the Japanese company’s biggest investors, after a series of vehicle safety scandals gave rise to concerns about his leadership and the future of the world’s biggest carmaker.】

item.title: 韩元因韩国央行政策决定和债券流入尾风而关注关键水平
item.description: 在持续的债券流入和央行下周不会降息的预期支撑下，韩元有望向关键水平走强。【原文：The Korean won is poised to strengthen toward a key level, supported by ongoing bond inflows and expectations the central bank will refrain from cutting interest rates next week.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所一年一度的 "伦敦金属交易所周 "聚会正在举行，交易商和分析师在铜的最新涨势中汇聚一堂。白糖期货有望创下 1 月份以来的最佳表现。美国公用事业在 S&P 500 指数中的表现优于其他行业，部分原因是人工智能的需求。【原文：London Metal Exchange’s annual LME Week gathering is underway, bringing together traders and analysts amid copper’s latest upswing. Sugar futures are on track for their best month since January. And US utilities are outshining other industry groups in the S&P 500, thanks in part to AI demand.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Systematica 利用新型技术处理数据
item.description: 作为一名量化投资人，对冲基金经理莱达-布拉加（Leda Braga）早在 2008 年就聘请了她的第一位人工智能博士，以建立计算机主导的交易策略。最近，她需要一位新型计算机科学家。【原文：As a quant, hedge fund manager Leda Braga hired her first Ph.D. in artificial intelligence back in 2008 to build out computer-led trading strategies. Lately, she’s needed a new type of computer scientist.】

item.title: 加文-纽森否决了加州有争议的人工智能安全法案
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）否决了一项有争议的人工智能安全法案，该法案要求公司确保其人工智能模型不会造成重大伤害。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom has vetoed a contentious artificial intelligence safety bill that would have required companies to make sure their AI models don’t cause major harm.】

item.title: 恒天然提高红利政策，力争保持牛奶供应
item.description: 全球最大的乳制品出口商恒天然合作社集团（Fonterra Cooperative Group）的目标是向奶农支付更高的红利，以确保保留其在新西兰牛奶采集中的份额。【原文：Fonterra Cooperative Group, the world’s biggest dairy exporter, is targeting higher dividend payments to farmers to ensure it retains its share of New Zealand milk collection.】

item.title: 奥地利极右翼赢得大选，但建制派仍将执政
item.description: 奥地利的传统政治力量承诺在周日的全国大选后阻止极右翼自由党组建政府，这标志着为阻止欧洲日益高涨的民粹主义浪潮所做的最新努力。【原文：Austria’s traditional political powers are pledging to block the far-right Freedom Party from forming a government following Sunday’s national elections, marking the latest effort to stem the rising tide of populism in Europe.】

item.title: 股票入市，债券出局：今年余下时间的热门交易
item.description: 彭博市场实时脉搏（Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse）的最新调查显示，由于美联储不断降息，美国股市在今年剩余时间内的表现将优于美国政府和公司债券。【原文：US stocks will outperform the nation’s government and corporate bonds for the rest of this year as the Federal Reserve keeps cutting interest rates, the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey shows.】

item.title: 德国联邦铁路协会称，德国铁路联盟将投票反对全球国际货运的出售
item.description: 据《法兰克福汇报》（Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung）报道，德国铁路公司工会将试图阻止以 143 亿欧元（160 亿美元）将子公司德铁信可出售给丹麦货运公司 DSV A/S 的交易。【原文：A Deutsche Bahn AG labor union will try to block the agreed €14.3 billion ($16 billion) sale of subsidiary DB Schenker to Danish freight firm DSV A/S, Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung reported.】

item.title: 中国扩大支持范围，上海放宽购房规定
item.description: 中国金融中心上海放宽了对购房者的规定，成为首个落实中央政府对陷入困境的房地产行业的最新援助的顶级城市。【原文：China’s financial hub of Shanghai eased rules for homebuyers, the first top city to follow through on central government’s latest aid for the embattled property sector.】

item.title: 中国下调房贷利率以重振房地产市场
item.description: 中国采取措施降低了数百万家庭多达 5.3 万亿美元抵押贷款的借贷成本，这是中国为支撑陷入困境的房地产行业所做的最新尝试。【原文：China took steps to lower borrowing costs on as much as $5.3 trillion in mortgages for millions of families in its latest attempt to shore up the troubled property sector.】

item.title: 码头工人谈判陷入僵局，美国东部港口准备关闭
item.description: 主要行业和政府官员正在敦促美国码头工人及其雇主避免本周在东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸港口举行罢工，尽管许多设施已经在为停工做准备。【原文：Key industry and government officials are urging US dockworkers and their employers to avoid a strike at East and Gulf coast ports this week, though many facilities are already bracing for a shutdown.】

item.title: Meta 的 AR 眼镜表明苹果在 Vision Pro 上迷失了方向
item.description: Meta 公司最新推出的 AR 眼镜和更便宜的混合现实头戴式耳机给苹果公司带来了更大的压力，使其 Vision 计划难以奏效。此外：苹果公司正在加紧开发新的智能家居产品线，血氧功能有望重返手表。【原文：Meta’s latest AR glasses and cheaper mixed-reality headset add pressure on Apple to make its Vision push work. Also: Apple ramps up work on a new smart home lineup, and there’s fresh hope that the blood-oxygen feature will return to its watch.】

item.title: 新兴市场大事记：新兴市场地方债务众星捧月（播客）
item.description: 驻迪拜的斯里尼瓦桑-西瓦巴兰（Srinivasan Sivabalan）与宋子嘉一起讨论了为什么新兴市场本币债券在美联储开始降息后终于可以起飞。【原文：Dubai-based Srinivasan Sivabalan joins Zijia Song to discuss why emerging-market local currency bonds are finally ready for lift off after the Federal Reserve started cutting rates.】

item.title: 澳大利亚连续第二年预算盈余超过预期
item.description: 澳大利亚 16 年来首次连续出现预算盈余。【原文：Australia posted back-to-back budget surpluses for the first time in 16 years.】

item.title: 交易员撇清美国大选风险，股市驶入十月
item.description: 美国股市度过了传统上一年中最艰难的一段时期，尽管总统选举活动充满争议、美联储政策不断变化以及人们担心经济即将衰退，但投资者预计 10 月份美股将继续反弹。【原文：US stocks survived what’s traditionally their toughest stretch of the year, and investors expect the rally to keep running in October despite a contentious presidential election campaign, shifting Federal Reserve policy and fears of a pending recession.】

item.title: 基利安-姆巴佩入股德国电子公司 Loewe
item.description: 法国足球明星基利安-姆巴佩（Kylian Mbappe）收购了德国电子公司 Loewe Technology GmbH 的股份，该公司预计这笔投资将增加销售额，并有可能为首次公开募股铺平道路。【原文：French football star Kylian Mbappe has acquired a stake in German electronics firm Loewe Technology GmbH, an investment the company expects will increase sales and potentially pave the way for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 南非因未偿还债务面临供水危机：城市新闻
item.description: 据 City Press 援引南非水与卫生部副部长大卫-马赫洛博（David Mahlobo）的话报道，由于市政债务不断增加和基础设施瘫痪，南非面临着日益恶化的供水问题。【原文：South Africa faces worsening water supply problems due to rising municipal debt and failing infrastructure, City Press reported, citing Deputy Water and Sanitation Minister David Mahlobo.】

item.title: 石破获胜后日本股市将因加息担忧而下跌
item.description: 石破茂在执政党领导层竞选中出人意料地获胜，引发了人们对加息的预期，日本股市周一可能会暴跌。【原文：Japanese stocks will likely tumble on Monday after Shigeru Ishiba’s surprise victory in the ruling party’s leadership race raised expectations that interest rates will increase.】

item.title: 上海证券交易所努力修复令对冲基金震惊的故障
item.description: 上周末，上海证券交易所进行了周末压力测试，交易员们为周一可能出现的波动做好了准备，因为上周末的交易问题误导了一些量化对冲基金。【原文：The Shanghai Stock Exchange ran weekend stress tests and traders braced for a potentially volatile session on Monday after transaction problems at the end of last week wrongfooted a number of quantitative hedge funds.】

item.title: Eurizon 的任志强称中国股市可能出现 "严重反弹
item.description: Eurizon SLJ Capital 的 Stephen Jen 认为，中国股市和人民币在近期刺激政策的推动下上涨，中国债券也在下跌，投资者应该延续这种涨势。【原文：Investors should extend the recent stimulus-fuelled gains in Chinese equities and the yuan as well as the decline in the country’s bonds, according to Stephen Jen of Eurizon SLJ Capital.】

item.title: 瑞银主席告诉报纸他低估了对埃尔莫蒂薪酬的反应
item.description: 瑞银集团董事长科尔姆-凯莱赫（Colm Kelleher）表示，他低估了公众对首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）2023 年 1440 万瑞士法郎（1710 万美元）薪酬方案的负面反应。【原文：UBS Group AG Chairman Colm Kelleher said he had underestimated the negative public response to Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti’s 14.4 million Swiss franc ($17.1 million) pay package in 2023.】
